thread.title: Carey Mulligan Welcomes First Child with Marcus Mumford
thread.title_full: Carey Mulligan Welcomes First Child with Marcus Mumford

author: TV Guide
title: Carey Mulligan Welcomes First Child with Marcus Mumford
text: Carey Mulligan Welcomes First Child with Marcus Mumford Carey Mulligan has welcomed a child with her husband Marcus Mumford, ... Comment Posted Oct. 7, 2015 at 4:57 PM By TV Guide Posted Oct. 7, 2015 at 4:57 PM Carey Mulligan has welcomed a child with her husband Marcus Mumford, E! News reports. "Carey has given birth to a healthy and happy baby," a source revealed. "She is just enjoying this time with her family and close friends." The 30-year-old actress walked the red carpet for the first time on Wednesday since giving birth when she attended the British Film Institute's London Film Festival to promote her film Suffragette . Her husband is also keeping busy, preparing to resume his world tour with his band Mumford and Sons next month. Mulligan and Mumford, who were childhood pen pals growing up, quietly wed on a farm in 2012. The couple announced they were expecting a child in June. By TV Guide
